document_data.caption: Letters and numerals of Thorass.
document_data.name: Thorass
document_data.mainbody:
'''Thorass''' was the name of the alphabet used by the large majority of human languages on [[Faer√ªn]], including [[Common]].

The alphabet was first developed for use with the [[Thorass language]] by a scribe whose name has been lost to history

[[File:ThorassMenu.jpg|alt=Transcript: Menu: Roasted Chicken, Mashed Beans, Pottage Stew, Cabbage and Beans, Poultry|thumb|''A sign displaying a restaurant's menu in [[Baldur's Gate]], written in the Thorass alphabet.'']]
Thorass was the script used in Common, [[Alzhedo language|Alzhedo]], [[Chessentan language|Chessentan]], [[Chondathan language|Chondathan]], [[Durpari language|Durpari]], [[Illuskan language|Illuskan]], [[Midani language|Midani]] (in [[Anauroch]] only), [[Rasallesian]], [[Tuigan language|Tuigan]], [[Turmic]], and [[Uluik]].
